RESPONDENT'S EXHIBITS: NIL //True copy// P.A. to Judge ds . 2018/KER/717 P.UBAID, J. ~ CrILM.C. No. 6480 of 2014 Dated this the 08" day of January, 2018 ORDER The petitioner seeks orders quashing the crime and further proceedings as against him in Crime No. 1 of 2014 of the Excise Enforcement and Anti Narcotic Squad, Idukki. His case is that he has nothing to do with the allegations made in the crime report. The petitioner has produced the copy of an intimation received by him from the office of the CB-CID, which shows that steps were being, at that time, taken to drop the proceedings against him. In view of such a report, the prosecution was directed by this Court on 22.11.2017 to file a report as to whether the crime as against the petitioner is being referred, or whether he has been removed from the array of accused. Now it is submitted by the learned Public Prosecutor that the investigating officer has already filed report in the court below on 09.08.2017 dropping the further proceedings les 2018/KER/717 Cri.M.C. No. 6480 of 2014 -2- against the petitioner. If so, there is no proceeding to be quashed by this Court under Section 482 Cr.P.C.. The submission made by the learned Public Prosecutor is recorded in the proceedings. In case anything happened otherwise, contrary to the submissions made by the learned Public Prosecutor, the officer who gave instructions to the learned Public Prosecutor will have to be dealt with, and appropriate proceedings can be initiated by the petitioner. In the above circumstances, this application is closed. P.UBAID JUDGE ds 08.01.2018 /f{True copy// P.A. To Judge . 2018/KER/717 Crl.M.C. No. 6480 of 2014 -3- P.UBAID, J. CriLM.C. No. 6480 of 2014 Dated this the 22" day of November, 2017 ORDER The copy of the intimation received by the petitioner from the office of the CBCID, produced in court, shows that steps are being taken by the CBCID to delete the name of the petitioner from the array of accused. The authenticity of this communication will have to be verified. The learned Public Prosecutor will ascertain the facts, and obtain such a report from the Investigating Officer as to whether the crime as against the petitioner is being referred, or whether he has been removed from the array of accused. Post on 29.11.2017. P.UBAID JUDGE ds 22.11.2017
